content.query:
-- query from folders using filename function
SELECT
    result.filename() as filename,
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        data_source='nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS [result]

--using filepath function
SELECT
    result.filename() as filename,
    result.filepath() as filepath,
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        data_source='nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS [result]

-- using filepath function
SELECT
    result.filename() as filename,
    result.filepath(1) as month,
    result.filepath(2) as year,
count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        data_source='nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS [result]
where result.filepath(1)='2021' and result.filepath(2) in ('02','03')
group by result.filename(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
order by result.filename(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
